name: Mike Perez

name: Nick Foster
text: Decent but not spectacular.  Fairly quick and kid friendly.

name: Kyle B.
text: Great pizza! Awesome fried chicken! Ice cream macine!  Friendly staff and clean restaurant. Pizza Ranch is a fun chain that started in NW Iowa and has grown from there. Don't be fooled by the name, the chicken is as good as the pizza! They have a really nice salad bar too.

text: Chicken was good & hot. Pizza was tasty glad 2 c there back open

name: Jeremy Moranville
text: I ordered a pizza, thought I would get said pizza but no, was offered slices & they took the pizza away & gave it to others. Why?

name: Lee Walker
text: Nice large dining areas.  The building can have a good stream of customers and not feel crowded.  The buffet was good both times I've been to this location with fresh chicken with full variety of pieces, and also a large variety of desert pizza.

name: Michael Spurlin
text: Very good place to eat! Buffet style and during lunch, everything was hat and delicious. Easy to get to also. Stop by for good food!

name: Andrew Reyes
text: Pizza ranch should really be called chicken ranch.  The fried chicken is truly delicious.  The pizza is acceptable at best.  On this particular occasion, we placed a sizeable order of the delicious chicken for our crew at work.  I made sure ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Hazen
text: This Pizza Ranch is almost always a homerun for us. The restrooms are always clean, the food hot and cooked promptly, and the service we receive is punctual and polite. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is because their pizza selection. The buffet has, on two different visits, had not a very wide selection available.

name: Muriel Davis-Goga
text: I wanted chicken. I loved the chicken and mashed potatoes and gravy. I love there meat lovers pizza. There Buffett includes a drink that is awesome.

text: Great price for the buffet.  First time I have seen a buffet that will let you order your choice and put it on the buffet table.  Nice idea really good pizza. Great staff.

text: If i could put no stars i would. We made a big order for our company and the biscuits were cold. They forgot the coleslaw which we were charged for and unless someone is desperate to go and get it there really is no reason to make that drive. Service and consideration of the elements is terrible. NVR again.

text: Everyone needs to try it, will surprise you. It has great salad,and great pizza. But the big surprise is chicken! Large, juicy, and fresh. Add real potatoes, or green beans, or grat stuffing.
